Determining Basic REPS Eligibility When Death Occurred in Service After August 12, 1981
If death occurred in service after August 12, 1981, the St. Louis ROâ€™s rating activity must review the service treatment records to determine if the disease or injury that resulted in or contributed to death had its onset before August 13, 1981.
Basic REPS eligibility exists if the condition that caused death had its onset before August 13, 1981.
